text: Dimaadua di Gowaa Aamua, go di God o Israel, gu gaamai gi di au nia helekai ang gi Shemaiah, tangada o Nehelam, dela ne bida hagau dana lede i dono ingoo ang gi digau Jerusalem mo ang gi tangada hai mee dabu go Zephaniah, tama daane a Maaseiah, mo ang gi digau hai mee dabu huogodoo ala i golo. I lodo di lede deenei, Shemaiah la ne hihi beenei gi Zephaniah:
